name: allthatweheldback
description:
an astronaut stranded in space, what is left for you to do?

a very short experience

this project is pretty personal and kind of a gamble, so please don't hesitate to leave feedback.

thanks a lot to :

Infinity Frequencies for the music - https://computer-gaze.bandcamp.com/

Dorian Beaugendre for the astronaut - https://tymus.itch.io/

A Game By Its Cover jam for inspiration - http://famicase.com/18/softs/244.html

you
